string.text: Why sleep now?! Time to move!
THERE IS STILL UNFINISHED BUSINESS AT THE CORDON
GOING TO THE SWAMP ALONE MEANS CERTAIN DEATH
I finished the repairs. You can pick up your AK.
Listen, man, the tech guy here wants cash for the gas. I ain't gonna pay him, better do it yourself. Good luck.
Screw the gas, damn it! Help me out, the bandits are all over!
Son of a... Hold on, I'm coming!
Hey, pal! I forgot to message you yesterday that I escorted the soldier and got a decent sum out of it. Thanks for the tip — I'll make it up to you! Talk to you later!
I lost it! Damn it, seems like it went invisible... Lead it to me quickly or you're dead!
I should get rid of others to not draw attention
STILL HAVE UNFINISHED BUSINESS AT THE CORDON
CANNOT ENTER THE LABORATORY RIGHT NOW
THE AREA AHEAD IS TOO DANGEROUS
Hey, stalker, I'm done with your rifle. You can come get it.
Guess who it is, honey? That's right, daddy!
Listen, daddy's got something important to tell you.
When you get back from school, be sure to eat and do your homework.
Daddy's going on a general meeting organized by the scientists.
I'll be gone for a couple of hours — keep in touch and be a good girl. Daddy loves you.
Mommy, Sashka and I are being sent out of the village!
Something here exploded again, and everyone's being told to leave.
Mommy thinks you won't come back, but she's wrong!
I know you'll come back and be with us again, daddy, I just know it!
Stalker, I have an offer for you. Come by when you finish your work. I'll wait.
Can anyone hear me? I need immediate help! I'm at the underground entrance!
Come here, stalker. Let's hang out a bit.
LEAVING NOVOSHEPELYCHI IS TOO DANGEROUS AT THIS TIME
BEFORE LEAVING NOVOSHEPELYCHI, THE TRANSMUTED ARTIFACT SHOULD BE RIDDEN OF
FIRST NEED TO VISIT THE CORDON
THE ROAD AHEAD IS COVERED WITH ANOMALIES
NO PERMISSION TO ENTER THE BAR
Why sleep now? Can't keep Zakhar waiting!
NO PERMISSION TO ACCESS DUTY TERRITORY!
Going back to the bandit base is suicidal. I should find another way.
Sid, I somehow managed to survive and got hold of a device from the scientists. Should I bring it to you?
Don't take anything. Who knows what it might be! I'll wait for you to come back and tell me what happened.
Axe, bring me that thing! I'm dying to find out what it is.
Mikhalych? How the hell did you get here?
I built up my cracking skills on the outside. Tell you more later. Bring me the device and I'll find something to reward you with.
What's going on there? You retard, did you bring the scientist device into the village?! Brainless idiot!

Sid, some strange shit is going down here. The intellectuals made their way to the floating village. One of them is going through teleporters — I've never seen anything like it! It seems they're preparing to plant some of their equipment.
I see. Best you don't go there — I don't need any devices in my bunker. Who knows what might be inside those things.
Axe, I have a request for you: fetch me that thing you told the trader about just now. I'm also curious about what those daredevils are up to.
Mikhalych?! How did you know about that?
I have my ways. I built up my cracking skills on the outside — I'll tell you more later. Bring me the device and I'll find something to reward you with.
You've convinced me. I'll give it a shot. First, though, I'll wait until the intellectuals scram.

Sid, I lost the scientists but found out from a stalker's message that they made their way to the floating village. One of them went through some teleporters and set up some device there. Should I try getting it?
Best you don't go there — I don't need any devices in my bunker. Who knows what might be inside those things.
Axe, I have a request for you: fetch me that thing you told the trader about just now. I'm also curious about what those daredevils are up to.
Mikhalych?! How did you know about that?
I have my ways. I built up my cracking skills on the outside — I'll tell you more later. Bring me the device and I'll find something to reward you with.
I'll see what I can do.
I'll try breaking open the door...
We'll keep watch on the yard.
Commander, I have eyes on something in the area... something strange.
Go, I'll manage on my own. Don't worry about me.
Come in, Koval! Are you done with your equipment? Do you read me?
Son of a bitch. I knew he'd cause problems!
Come on, boss. Where'd you go?
Come on. What are you waiting for?
Don't get mad, commander. It won't happen again.
I'll set up the equipment now. Keep watch, will you?
Commander, there's something wrong here. I'm also feeling groggy.
Commander, we'll cover you while you go upstairs. Hurry, they're all over the place!
How are you, commander? Any more and we'd be done for. You shut off that brain-twister just in time.
I feel sorry for all those scientists, security guards, stalkers... They'll remain here forever now. They won't even get a burial.
It's a shame. Shame that all of this happened because of some absurdity.
Yo, hombre! Come over here and let's talk business!
BAD IDEA GOING TO THE BANDITS WITHOUT A REASON
I have a lead on our search. I'd say we've hit jackpot! Two days ago, some stalkers shared a message saying that a scientist was torn apart by an anomaly. Could that be our client?
Zhuravlyov, do you copy? I have the results. Those remains you found in the anomaly aren't from Dubinin. Everything was staged so that we wouldn't find him. That's the news. Over and out.
SHOULD FIRST FIND OTHER LEADS AT THE CORDON
WE HAVE NOT BEEN ORDERED TO LEAVE AGROPROM
THERE IS NO INTEL ON THIS AREA
THE HOLE IS FILLED TO THE BRIM
THE ROAD TO THE RED FOREST IS PACKED WITH MUTANTS
GOING TO THE RADAR IS A ONE-WAY TRIP

Here I am in the Zone again. I should make some earnings at the Cordon, stock up on gear, get back in the saddle and move further... to more interesting and dangerous places. To where you're on your own.
It didn't take long for me to see new areas. My current task is to establish myself in these parts and start making a living far from the perimeter.
I never would've thought I'd have to do business with the bandits of all people. I hope this whole affair will get me somewhere... or that I'll at least stay neutral.

Trukhlyay is dead. His former partners attacked us in the worst possible moment. In my attempt to leave, I stumbled upon some passage under the bandit base. I should be careful not to get myself into any further trouble.

After dealing with the bandits, I found myself in another equally exciting adventure: being the errand boy for the scientists. In all fairness, they pay a fair sum. If only it were the same everywhere else.

The area around Novoshepelychi has shown itself as one of the most interesting and mysterious places in the Zone. Just as I was heading there, I felt the sheer size of these foresty areas, and every second of being here makes me more and more uncomfortable.
Our squad has been tasked to investigate the radio silence at Lake Yantar.
Professor Dubinin's disappearance left the institute leadership greatly concerned. I've been tasked with finding any clues about his disappearance or, better yet, the professor himself.
It's time to get to the bottom of what's hiding in this underground laboratory: who Termite and his mercenaries are, as well as what professor Dubinin is doing here.
Stalker, your order is ready. You can come get it.
Your order has arrived. Drop by.
Buddy, I talked to Sid. Come to the village and I'll give you your reward. I'll be at the fire with my guys.
You're not the most talkative one, stalker. Have my stash coordinates as a ward. Fair winds.
You have accessed items from Axe's personal box
DO YOU REALLY WANT TO LEAVE THE ZONE?
A SERIES OF DECISIVE EVENTS WILL FOLLOW. MAKE SURE\nYOU COMPLETE ALL YOUR TASKS BEFORE MOVING ON,\nSO THAT YOU DO NOT LOSE THE PROGRESS YOU HAVE MADE.
